name: iQQ Partner B Client (CLI003)

values.description: Base API URL (without version). Version is specified in request path (e.g., /v1/package)
Partner B Client - Maps to CLI003. Get from Terraform or AWS Console
Get from Terraform or AWS Console
Partner B API Key - Tagged with clientId=CLI003. Get from Terraform or AWS Console

description:
Partner B client environment with CLI003 preferences and versioning support.

Client Preferences (CLI003):
- No preferences configured
- Expected result: All 3 quotes (APCO, Client Direct, Route66)

API Versions:
- v1: Stable (production)
- v2-v9: Testing/planned

Setup Instructions:
1. Get credentials from Terraform:
   terraform output -json cognito_partner_clients | jq -r '.partner_b.client_id'
   terraform output -json cognito_partner_client_secrets | jq -r '.partner_b'
   terraform output -raw partner_b_api_key_value
2. Replace YOUR_CLIENT_ID, YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET, YOUR_API_KEY
3. Run 'Get OAuth Token' to authenticate
4. Test endpoints with different versions

IMPORTANT: This is a template file. Copy and fill in your credentials.
